m_szDocTitle: Patent US5529860 - Electroactive high storage capacity polyacetylene-co-polysulfur materials ... - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: Claims(33) What is claimed is: 1. Art electrochemically active polyacetylene-co-polysulfur material, which in its oxidized state, is of the general formula I ##STR7## wherein x ranges from greater than 1 to about 100, and n is greater than or equal to 2, and said polyacetylene-co-polysulfur material does not contain aliphatic or aromatic moieties. 2. The material of claim 1 wherein said polyacetylene-co-polysulfur electroactive material is of formula I, wherein x is greater than 2 and n is greater than 5. 3. The material of claim 1 wherein said polyacetylene-co-polysulfur electroactive materia
